abstract: NHL Roundup; New Jersey Devils defeat Minnesota Wild, 7-4; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: The Devils had their best offensive performance of the season with a 7-4 victory over the Minnesota Wild in Newark on Thursday night.

headline.main: Devils Score Seven Goals and Subdue the Wild
headline.print_headline: Devils Score Seven Goals and Subdue the Wild

snippet: The Devils had their best offensive performance of the season with a 7-4 victory over the Minnesota Wild in Newark on Thursday night.
